title: Houston reports rise in people dying at home as coronavirus surges
description:
Houston reports rise in people dying at home as coronavirus surges
As coronavirus cases continue to grow in Houston, Texas, reports of people dying at home are also on the rise.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Video shows Glee actress Naya Rivera renting boat before disappearance
description: Naya Rivera and her 4-year-old son are seen on security footage renting a pontoon boat and departing on Lake Piru. Hours later the rental company went searching and found the boy sleeping on board.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Orlando’s Disney World reopens this weekend with coronavirus restrictions
description: The iconic theme park reopens its Magic Kingdom and Animal Kingdom parks this weekend, requiring reservations for limited tickets that have already sold out for July. The return comes as Florida has become a hot spot for the coronavirus pandemic.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Schools struggle with high costs of reopening: masks, sanitizer and more
description: An average sized school district of 3,700 kids now needs to budget for an estimated $1.8 million in extra safety costs for hand sanitizer, disposable masks, additional custodial staff and more.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump promises road to citizenship for Dreamers in new interview
description: President Trump addressed the coronavirus crisis in a new interview, saying “we’re winning the war” against COVID-19, though cases continue to rise. Trump also promised an executive order to preserve DACA and give Dreamers a road to citizenship.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: What the U.S. can learn from Europe's coronavirus strategy
description: The United States is seeing a surge in coronavirus cases, while much of Europe is getting back to business. Countries there had national COVID-19 policies, accepted mask requirements and lifted closures slowly.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Inside a South Carolina hospital, coronavirus surge overwhelms staff
description: ICU beds are quickly running out inside this South Carolina hospital as healthcare workers struggle to keep up with skyrocketing coronavirus cases.
source.name: NBC News

title: Coronavirus testing lines stretch for blocks as cases surge across the U.S
